# Ratings & Reviews
 - 3.5 out of 5                      152K Ratings
 - Great but…         Jul 1   grsrbr    This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.  - Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.         Sep 19   hotace6813    I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless  “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you  to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.       Useless app and developers.  - Needs an update         Nov 1   Nynini91    I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. # Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Great but…

This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

# Needs an update
Nynini91
I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.

# Accessibility
The developer, Apple, indicated that this app supports the following accessibility features to help make common tasks in the app faster and easier to complete. Learn More
 - VoiceOver Navigate and explore the app using gestures, braille, and speech output.
 - Voice Control Navigate and interact with the app using your voice to tap, swipe, type, and more.
 - Larger Text Increase the text size in the app to 200% or more.
 - Differentiate Without Color Alone Use shapes or text, in addition to or instead of color, to distinguish key information.
 - Sufficient Contrast Increase or adjust the contrast between text or iconography and background.
 - Reduced Motion Modify or reduce certain types of animation that may cause motion sickness or discomfort.
 - Captions Display the dialogue and relevant sounds of video or audio-only content with text, usually time-synchronized.

 - Jeffrey C. Adams         Jun 27   J. C. Adams    Yesterday, June 26, I was held by two different Apple Support advisors. Both were just excellent. And both helped me straighten out. The Apple mail function on my iMac computer. It was really very complex. Both advisors dealt with different parts of getting me up with my email. One advisor was in New Brunswick Canada. And the other advisor was located near Charlotte, North Carolina. It really took sessions with two different advisors to straighten the email situation out. I bought my first McIntosh desktop computer in 1987. I get a lot of use out of my computer. Both have a one terabyte hard drive. I use it mostly for business in personal correspondence. It is an important part of my personal well-being. I value the fact that I get support by competent people that you retain as advisors. I also bought the three-year warranty on the new. 24 inch iMac that I purchased in August 2024. I am finding that the software and operating protocol of this newest computer is much mor more sophisticated than the previous iMac unit that I retired. It’s important to me to be able to talk with these advisors by phone. It’s more helpful at this point than going to the website. My family has strong brand loyalty to McIntosh computers. While I haven’t had the chance to visit an Apple Store in person, their online support and customer service have truly stood out. Every interaction I’ve had has been met with prompt, professional, and friendly responses. The support team is always willing to go the extra mile to resolve any issues quickly and efficiently, making me feel valued as a customer.In addition, Apple’s products consistently impress me with their innovative design, reliability, and seamless integration. From the intuitive user interfaces to the robust performance, every device feels thoughtfully crafted. Whether it’s the MacBook, iPhone, or iPad, the quality is consistently top-tier.Overall, my experiences with Apple have been nothing short of excellent. I wholeheartedly recommend them for anyone who values quality, reliability, and outstanding customer service.  - Clearing Safari history became unreasonably inefficient & difficult!!!!         12/09/2024   InstMus    Ever since iOS 17 or 18, it’s become a nightmare to clear Safari history and even worse when I need to turn “Block All Cookies” on or off. The update is insanely horribly designed. Please count how many steps it takes to go into Settings, then into Apps, then into Safari, then to block all cookies or clear history. Apple programmers cannot tell me that they don’t know it’s important for users to clear our Safari history multiple times a day especially prior to entering sensitive apps!! And we need to block cookies until a shopping website requires us to turn the setting off in for the shopping cart to work. But after we order that pizza, we need to turn the setting on to block cookies again. These Safari settings should be right on the top layer within reach. We should be able to access these Safari settings in Control Center or as a standalone widget with as few steps as possible. But noooo, Apple did it the opposite way, and made it even harder to access than before (which had already been no picnic for years). Now it’s just absurd and annoying. Please fix this!!!! Thank you! # Jeffrey C. Adams
J. C. Adams
Yesterday, June 26, I was held by two different Apple Support advisors. Both were just excellent. And both helped me straighten out. The Apple mail function on my iMac computer. It was really very complex. Both advisors dealt with different parts of getting me up with my email. One advisor was in New Brunswick Canada. And the other advisor was located near Charlotte, North Carolina. It really took sessions with two different advisors to straighten the email situation out. I bought my first McIntosh desktop computer in 1987. I get a lot of use out of my computer. Both have a one terabyte hard drive. I use it mostly for business in personal correspondence. It is an important part of my personal well-being. I value the fact that I get support by competent people that you retain as advisors. I also bought the three-year warranty on the new. 24 inch iMac that I purchased in August 2024. I am finding that the software and operating protocol of this newest computer is much mor more sophisticated than the previous iMac unit that I retired. It’s important to me to be able to talk with these advisors by phone. It’s more helpful at this point than going to the website. My family has strong brand loyalty to McIntosh computers. Thank you for being there!

# Great customer service
Doubledeeper
I’ve had an outstanding experience with Apple over the years. While I haven’t had the chance to visit an Apple Store in person, their online support and customer service have truly stood out. Every interaction I’ve had has been met with prompt, professional, and friendly responses. The support team is always willing to go the extra mile to resolve any issues quickly and efficiently, making me feel valued as a customer.In addition, Apple’s products consistently impress me with their innovative design, reliability, and seamless integration. From the intuitive user interfaces to the robust performance, every device feels thoughtfully crafted. Whether it’s the MacBook, iPhone, or iPad, the quality is consistently top-tier.Overall, my experiences with Apple have been nothing short of excellent. I wholeheartedly recommend them for anyone who values quality, reliability, and outstanding customer service.

# Clearing Safari history became unreasonably inefficient & difficult!!!!
InstMus
Ever since iOS 17 or 18, it’s become a nightmare to clear Safari history and even worse when I need to turn “Block All Cookies” on or off. The update is insanely horribly designed. Please count how many steps it takes to go into Settings, then into Apps, then into Safari, then to block all cookies or clear history. Apple programmers cannot tell me that they don’t know it’s important for users to clear our Safari history multiple times a day especially prior to entering sensitive apps!! And we need to block cookies until a shopping website requires us to turn the setting off in for the shopping cart to work. But after we order that pizza, we need to turn the setting on to block cookies again. These Safari settings should be right on the top layer within reach. We should be able to access these Safari settings in Control Center or as a standalone widget with as few steps as possible. But noooo, Apple did it the opposite way, and made it even harder to access than before (which had already been no picnic for years). Now it’s just absurd and annoying. Please fix this!!!! Thank you!

# Useless apps and security fixes
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

• Performance enhancements and bug fixes Introduced in Version 4.9: • Added Bulgarian, Croatian, and Greek as supported languages • Expanded region availability to: Afghanistan, Albania, Algeria, Angola, Anguilla, Antigua & Barbuda, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Bahamas, Barbados, Belarus, Belize, Benin, Bermuda, Bhutan, Bolivia, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Botswana, British Virgin Islands, Brunei, Burkina Faso, Cambodia, Cameroon, Cape Verde, Cayman Islands, Chad, Congo-Brazzaville, Congo-Kinshasa, Costa Rica, Côte d’Ivoire, Croatia, Cyprus, Dominica, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Estonia, Eswatini, Fiji, Gabon, Gambia, Georgia, Ghana, Greece, Grenada, Guatemala, Guinea-Bissau, Guyana, Honduras, Iceland, Iraq, Jamaica, Kazakhstan, Kenya, Kuwait, Kyrgyzstan, Laos, Latvia, Liberia, Libya, Lithuania, Madagascar, Malawi, Maldives, Mali, Malta, Mauritania, Mauritius, Micronesia, Moldova, Mongolia, Montenegro, Montserrat, Morocco, Mozambique, Myanmar (Burma), Namibia, Nauru, Nepal, Nicaragua, Niger, Nigeria, North Macedonia, Pakistan, Palau, Panama, Papua New Guinea, Paraguay, Peru, Rwanda, São Tomé & Príncipe, Senegal, Serbia, Seychelles, Sierra Leone, Slovenia, Solomon Islands, South Africa, Sri Lanka, St. Kitts & Nevis, St. Lucia, St. Vincent & Grenadines, Suriname, Tajikistan, Tanzania, Tonga, Trinidad & Tobago, Tunisia, Turkmenistan, Turks & Caicos Islands, Uganda, Uruguay, Uzbekistan, Vanuatu, Venezuela, Yemen, Zambia, Zimbabwe Note: The Apple Support app, AppleCare+ plans, and certain features of the app and/or AppleCare+ plans are available only in select countries or regions.
## 4.9.1
This update introduces 3 new languages and expands availability to 118 new regions. The Apple Support app is now available in 31 languages and 173 regions. • Added Bulgarian, Croatian, and Greek as supported languages • Expanded region availability to: Afghanistan, Albania, Algeria, Angola, Anguilla, Antigua & Barbuda, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Bahamas, Barbados, Belarus, Belize, Benin, Bermuda, Bhutan, Bolivia, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Botswana, British Virgin Islands, Brunei, Burkina Faso, Cambodia, Cameroon, Cape Verde, Cayman Islands, Chad, Congo-Brazzaville, Congo-Kinshasa, Costa Rica, Côte d’Ivoire, Croatia, Cyprus, Dominica, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Estonia, Eswatini, Fiji, Gabon, Gambia, Georgia, Ghana, Greece, Grenada, Guatemala, Guinea-Bissau, Guyana, Honduras, Iceland, Iraq, Jamaica, Kazakhstan, Kenya, Kuwait, Kyrgyzstan, Laos, Latvia, Liberia, Libya, Lithuania, Madagascar, Malawi, Maldives, Mali, Malta, Mauritania, Mauritius, Micronesia, Moldova, Mongolia, Montenegro, Montserrat, Morocco, Mozambique, Myanmar (Burma), Namibia, Nauru, Nepal, Nicaragua, Niger, Nigeria, North Macedonia, Pakistan, Palau, Panama, Papua New Guinea, Paraguay, Peru, Rwanda, São Tomé & Príncipe, Senegal, Serbia, Seychelles, Sierra Leone, Slovenia, Solomon Islands, South Africa, Sri Lanka, St. Kitts & Nevis, St. Lucia, St. Vincent & Grenadines, Suriname, Tajikistan, Tanzania, Tonga, Trinidad & Tobago, Tunisia, Turkmenistan, Turks & Caicos Islands, Uganda, Uruguay, Uzbekistan, Vanuatu, Venezuela, Yemen, Zambia, Zimbabwe • Performance enhancements and bug fixes Note: The Apple Support app, AppleCare+ plans, and certain features of the app and/or AppleCare+ plans are available only in select countries or regions.

 - Great but…         1 jul   grsrbr    This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products. # Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

# Needs an update
Nynini91
I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.

# Accesibilidad

# Accesibilidad
El desarrollador (Apple) indicó que esta app admite las siguientes funciones de accesibilidad para que sea más fácil y rápido realizar las tareas comunes. Obtén detalles
 - VoiceOver Navega y explora la app con gestos, código braille o descripciones auditivas.
 - Control por voz Navega e interactúa con la app usando tu voz para tocar, deslizar, escribir y mucho más.
 - Texto más grande Aumenta el tamaño del texto en la app al 200% o más.
 - Diferenciación no sólo con color Usa figuras o texto, como complemento o sustituto del color, para distinguir información relevante.
 - Suficiente contraste Aumenta o ajusta el contraste entre el texto o la iconografía y el fondo.
 - Movimiento reducido Modifica o reduce ciertos tipos de animaciones que pueden causar mareos o malestar.
 - Subtítulos Muestra el diálogo y los sonidos relevantes de contenidos de video o sólo audio con texto generalmente sincronizado.

 - Great but…         1 يوليو   grsrbr    This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products. # Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. # Needs an update
Nynini91
I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.

# تسهيلات الاستخدام

# تسهيلات الاستخدام
أشار المطوّر، Apple، إلى أن هذا التطبيق يدعم ميزات تسهيلات الاستخدام التالية للمساعدة في تيسير والإسراع بإتمام المهام الشائعة في التطبيق. معرفة المزيد
 - التعليق الصوتي التنقل واستكشاف التطبيق باستخدام الإيماءات وطريقة برايل ومخرجات الكلام.
 - التحكم بالصوت التنقل والتفاعل مع التطبيق باستخدام صوتك للضغط والتمرير والكتابة وغير ذلك الكثير.
 - نص أكبر زيادة حجم النص في التطبيق إلى ٢٠٠٪ أو أكثر.
 - التمييز بدون لون وحده استخدام الأشكال أو النصوص، بالإضافة إلى الألوان أو بدلاً منها، لتمييز المعلومات الأساسية.
 - التباين المناسب زيادة التباين أو ضبطه بين النصوص أو الأيقونات والخلفية.
 - تقليل الحركة تعديل أو تقليل أنواع معينة من أنماط الحركة التي قد تُسبب دوار الحركة أو عدم الراحة.
 - تعليقات توضيحية عرض الحوار والأصوات ذات الصلة لمحتوى فيديو أو محتوى صوتي فقط مع نص متزامن.

# Оценки и отзывы
 - 3,5 из 5                      Оценок: 152 тыс.
 - Great but…         1 июл.   grsrbr    This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. # Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

 - Данные об использова­нии
 - Диагностика

# Не связанные с пользова­телем данные
Может вестись сбор следующих данных, которые не связаны с личностью пользователя:
 - Диагностика
Разработчик может использовать различные способы обработки конфиденциальных данных в зависимости от таких факторов, как Ваш возраст и функции, которыми Вы пользуетесь. Подробнее

# Универсальный доступ

# Универсальный доступ
Разработчик Apple указал, что в этом приложении поддерживаются следующие функции универсального доступа, облегчающие и ускоряющие работу с приложением. Подробнее
 - VoiceOver Навигация по приложению с помощью жестов, дисплея Брайля и речевого вывода.
 - Управление голосом Навигация по приложению и взаимодействие с ним с помощью голосовых команд нажатия, смахивания, ввода и других действий.
 - Увеличенный текст Увеличение размера текста в приложении до 200 % или более.
 - Дифференциация не только с помощью цвета Выделение важной информации с помощью фигур или текста кроме или вместо цвета.
 - Достаточная контрастность Повышение или регулировка контрастности между текстом или значками и фоном.
 - Уменьшение движения Уменьшение интенсивности или изменение некоторых типов анимации, способных вызвать укачивание или дискомфорт.
 - Субтитры Отображение диалогов и звуков видео- или аудиоконтента в виде текста, обычно синхронизированного по времени.

 - Great but…         7月1日   grsrbr    This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products. # Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

# Needs an update

I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.

# 辅助功能

# 辅助功能
开发者“Apple”表明此 App 支持以下辅助功能，以协助更快、更轻松地完成 App 中的常见任务。 进一步了解
 - 旁白 使用手势、盲文和语音输出浏览和探索 App。
 - 语音控制 使用语音进行轻点、滑动、输入等操作，以浏览并与 App 互动。
 - 更大字体 将 App 中文字大小增加到 200% 或更大。
 - 不单靠颜色进行区分 除了颜色外，使用形状或文字区分关键信息。
 - 充足对比度 增加或调整文本或图标与背景之间的对比度。
 - 减弱动态效果 修改或减少可能导致晕动症或不适的特定类型的动画。
 - 字幕 以通常与时间同步的文本显示视频或纯音频内容的对话和相关声音。

 - Great but…         1 juil.   grsrbr    This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products. # Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

# Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

# Needs an update
Nynini91
I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.

# Accessibilité

# Accessibilité
Le développeur, Apple, a indiqué que cette app prend en charge les fonctionnalités d’accessibilité suivantes pour permettre d’effectuer plus rapidement et plus facilement les tâches courantes dans l’app. En savoir plus
 - VoiceOver Naviguez dans l’app et explorez‑la à l’aide de gestes, du braille et de sorties vocales.
 - Contrôle vocal Naviguez et interagissez avec l’app à l’aide de votre voix pour toucher, faire glisser, saisir du texte et bien plus encore.
 - Police plus grande Augmentez la taille du texte dans l’app à 200 % ou plus.
 - Différencier sans couleur seule Utilisez des formes ou du texte, en plus ou à la place des couleurs, pour distinguer les informations clés.
 - Contraste suffisant Augmentez ou ajustez le contraste entre le texte ou l’iconographie et l’arrière‑plan.
 - Animations réduites Modifiez ou réduisez certains types d’animation pouvant entraîner de la gêne ou des nausées.
 - Sous‑titres Affichez les dialogues et les sons pertinents d’un contenu vidéo ou uniquement audio grâce à du texte, généralement synchronisé.

 - Great but…         7월 1일   grsrbr    This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products. # Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Great but…

This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. # Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

# 손쉬운 사용

# 손쉬운 사용
개발자인 Apple에 따르면 이 앱은 앱 내에서 일반적인 작업을 더 빠르고 쉽게 완료할 수 있도록 도와주는 다음과 같은 손쉬운 사용 기능을 지원합니다. 더 알아보기
 - VoiceOver 제스처, 점자 및 음성 출력을 사용하여 앱으로 이동하고 둘러볼 수 있습니다.
 - 음성 명령 음성으로 앱을 탐색하고 앱과 상호 작용하여 탭하기, 쓸어넘기기, 입력하기 등의 작업을 수행할 수 있습니다.
 - 더 큰 텍스트 앱의 텍스트 크기를 200% 이상으로 늘립니다.
 - 색상 외의 요소로도 구별 주요 정보를 구분하는 데 색상 이외에 도형이나 텍스트를 사용합니다.
 - 충분한 대비 텍스트나 아이콘과 배경 간의 대비를 늘리거나 조절합니다.
 - 움직임 줄이기 멀미나 불편함을 유발할 수 있는 특정 유형의 애니메이션을 수정하거나 줄입니다.
 - 자막 비디오 또는 오디오 전용 콘텐츠의 대화 및 상황에 맞는 소리를 텍스트로 표시합니다. 대부분의 텍스트는 실시간 동기화됩니다.

 - Great but…         1 de jul.   grsrbr    This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products. # Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Great but…

This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. # Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.

# Needs an update
Nynini91
I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.

# Apple Store is the best i love Apple the way and i will always love Apple
Game Er lover
Best place to shop at in person and online I’m happy i got my iPhone 16 Plus delivered from them last year in November the delivery and shipment is very fast and great i love you apple fan workers a lot you guys are the best i also like the MagSafe wireless charger you guys it’s fast amazing it’s also one of my favorite Apple accessories you guys sell I’m also glad you guys sell New iPhones and Refurbished iPhones but personally me i buy brand new iPhones only because they last more longer and i always like to buy brand new stuff i hope i get to buy more Apple phones or Apple accessories from you guys be safe Apple workers and thank you for the help

# Acessibilidade

# Acessibilidade
O desenvolvedor, Apple, indicou que este app oferece os seguintes recursos de acessibilidade para ajudar a tornar as tarefas comuns no app mais rápidas e fáceis de concluir. Saiba mais
 - VoiceOver Permite navegar e explorar o app usando gestos, braille e saída de voz.
 - Controle por voz Permite navegar e interagir com o app usando a sua voz para tocar, deslizar, digitar e muito mais.
 - Texto maior Aumenta o tamanho do texto no app para 200% ou mais.
 - Diferenciar sem usar apenas cor Usa formas ou texto, além ou em vez de cor, para distinguir informações importantes.
 - Contraste suficiente Aumenta ou ajusta o contraste entre o texto ou a iconografia e o fundo.
 - Movimento reduzido Modifica ou reduz certos tipos de animação que podem causar enjoo ou desconforto.
 - Legendas Permite exibir diálogo e sons relevantes de conteúdo de vídeo ou somente de áudio com texto geralmente sincronizado.

I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. # Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

# Trợ năng

# Trợ năng
Nhà phát triển Apple cho biết ứng dụng này hỗ trợ các tính năng trợ năng sau đây để giúp thực hiện các tác vụ phổ biến trong ứng dụng nhanh chóng và dễ dàng hơn. Tìm hiểu thêm
 - VoiceOver Điều hướng và khám phá ứng dụng bằng cử chỉ, braille và tính năng đọc văn bản.
 - Khẩu lệnh Điều hướng và tương tác với ứng dụng bằng giọng nói để chạm, vuốt, nhập và thực hiện nhiều thao tác khác.
 - Chữ lớn hơn Tăng cỡ chữ trong ứng dụng lên 200% hoặc hơn.
 - Phân biệt không chỉ theo màu sắc Sử dụng hình dạng hoặc văn bản, bổ sung hoặc thay thế cho màu sắc, để phân biệt thông tin quan trọng.
 - Độ tương phản đầy đủ Tăng hoặc điều chỉnh độ tương phản giữa văn bản hoặc biểu tượng và nền.
 - Giảm chuyển động Sửa đổi hoặc giảm bớt một số loại hình ảnh động có thể gây triệu chứng say tàu xe hoặc gây khó chịu.
 - Chú thích Hiển thị hộp thoại và âm thanh có liên quan của nội dung video hoặc nội dung chỉ có âm thanh với văn bản thường được đồng bộ hóa theo thời gian.

# 評分與評論

 - Great but…         7月1日   grsrbr    This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.  - Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.         9月19日   hotace6813    I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless  “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you  to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.       Useless app and developers.  - Needs an update         11月1日   Nynini91    I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.       Needs an update          11月1日   Nynini91  I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. # Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# 輔助使用
開發者（Apple）表示，此 App 支援以下輔助使用功能，幫助使用者更輕鬆快速地完成 App 中的常見操作。 進一步瞭解
 - 旁白 使用手勢、點字和語音輸出瀏覽和探索 App。
 - 語音控制 使用語音執行點按、滑動、輸入與其他動作，以瀏覽並與 App 互動。
 - 放大文字 將 App 中的文字大小調整至 200% 或更大。
 - 不僅以顏色來區分 除了顏色外，使用形狀或文字區分關鍵資訊。
 - 足夠的對比度 增加或調整文字或圖示與背景之間的對比度。
 - 減少動態效果 調整或減少部分可能引起動暈症或不適的動畫效果。
 - 字幕 以文字顯示影片或純音訊內容的對話和相關聲音，通常為時間同步。

# Apple Store

# Ratings & Reviews
 - 3.5 out of 5                      152K Ratings
 - SOFTWARE UPDATES         5d ago   Pretty girl/ Emma T.    apple, you have got to change these software updates like every single time no so yesterday last night I had to get a software update and this morning update changed like my apps and my messages and now I'm so confused in the messages like you changed the profile pictures of the messages and changed the names of them. Like WHAT. WHAT TYPE OF STORE WOULD DO THAT. I'M sorry but I love iPhone more than any other phone but apple you gotta change or stop these updates they’re just too crazy.       SOFTWARE UPDATES          5d ago   Pretty girl/ Emma T.  apple, you have got to change these software updates like every single time no so yesterday last night I had to get a software update and this morning update changed like my apps and my messages and now I'm so confused in the messages like you changed the profile pictures of the messages and changed the names of them. Like WHAT. WHAT TYPE OF STORE WOULD DO THAT. I'M sorry but I love iPhone more than any other phone but apple you gotta change or stop these updates they’re just too crazy.
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - Your ads are in the way         Nov 29   Disgusted gamergurl    Hi. The App Store have lots of fun games that we all pick through to play. The games we choose to play are fun. However the ads that stay at the top or bottom of the game are in the way of scores and sometimes where you have to click to play. I’m not understanding why they are there while we are playing when it’s so many ads after each time we play a turn. Also sometimes in the middle of a turn an ad will interupt the game. Can you guys please consider removing the rectangle ad at the top or bottom of the games while we are playing. Everyone can’t afford to go ad free. I would have given 5 stars but I took one off for this reason.       Your ads are in the way          Nov 29   Disgusted gamergurl  Hi. The App Store have lots of fun games that we all pick through to play. The games we choose to play are fun. However the ads that stay at the top or bottom of the game are in the way of scores and sometimes where you have to click to play. I’m not understanding why they are there while we are playing when it’s so many ads after each time we play a turn. Also sometimes in the middle of a turn an ad will interupt the game. Can you guys please consider removing the rectangle ad at the top or bottom of the games while we are playing. Everyone can’t afford to go ad free. I would have given 5 stars but I took one off for this reason.
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - 
 - Great but…         Jul 1   grsrbr    This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.       Great but…          Jul 1   grsrbr  This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Your ads are in the way
Disgusted gamergurl
Hi. The App Store have lots of fun games that we all pick through to play. The games we choose to play are fun. However the ads that stay at the top or bottom of the game are in the way of scores and sometimes where you have to click to play. I’m not understanding why they are there while we are playing when it’s so many ads after each time we play a turn. Also sometimes in the middle of a turn an ad will interupt the game. Can you guys please consider removing the rectangle ad at the top or bottom of the games while we are playing. Everyone can’t afford to go ad free. I would have given 5 stars but I took one off for this reason.

# Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# The best!
Missy A.
I don’t think there is a better product on the market than Apple. Not only are the products amazing, but the technical help is one of a kind. They have people that actually know what they are doing, and more than not, they can work anything out. I have been an Apple customer for over 30 years, my first phone was an iPhone and that is the only phone I have ever used. Thanks Apple for making my life easier to bear, and in my eighties now I will stick with Apple until my end. Thanks for making my life more enjoyable.
